Class ModifierQueryNode

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanModifierNode 

           public class
       
        ModifierQueryNode
       
       extends
       
        QueryNodeImpl
    A ModifierQueryNode indicates the modifier value (+,-,?,NONE) for each term on the query string. For example "+t1 -t2 t3" will have a tree of:
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
